Posts.Content: la_157 wrote: I’ll be starting Verzenio as soon as I get delivery of it by mail. Is there anyone here who is taking it that can tell me a little about it first Hand? Thanks :) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone on Verzenio? la_157 la_157

Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2019 01:33PM la_157 wrote: I had radiation on my left breast back in 2012 for as many treatments as you and it is now smaller and much much firmer than my right breast to the point where it is uncomfortably tight. Same as you.I would get it looked at though just to be on the safe side because I have had other symptoms come up and have recently been diagnosed again. This past November with MBC.
Posts.Title: 3 years post radiation and still having sign effects deirdra deirdra
